title: Columbus Day, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation from Donald J. Trump, honoring Christopher Columbus on Columbus Day 2025. It highlights Columbus' life, his historic voyage in 1492, and his impact on Western civilization. The proclamation emphasizes Columbus' legacy of faith, courage, and perseverance, and condemns recent efforts to dishonor his memory. It also acknowledges the contributions of Italian-Americans and the shared values between the U.S. and Italy. The proclamation calls for the observance of Columbus Day with ceremonies and the display of the U.S. flag on public buildings.
